name: Core_CullMode
description: A cull mode identitifes a technique for deciding wether a triangle is removed based on its facing towards the viewer.
A triangle facing towards the viewer is called front-facing, a triangle facing away from the viewer is called back-facing.
The classification if a fragment is facing towards the viewer is usually done in window coordinate space.

elements.name: Core_CullMode_FrontAndBack
elements.description: Cull both front facing and back facing fragments. This is an alias of @{code('Core_CullMode_BackAndFront')}.

elements.name: Core_CullMode_BackAndFront
elements.description: Cull both back facing and front facing fragements. This is an alias of @{code('Core_CullMode_FrontAndBack')}.
